title: Fool That I Am
lyrics:
Fool that I am
For falling in love with you
And a fool that I am, oh
For thinking you loved me too
You took my heart
And then played the part of little coquette
All of my dreams, they just disappeared
Like the smoke from a cigarette, oh
Fool that I am
For hoping you'd understand
And thinking you would listen too, oh
Oh, the things... the things I had planned
But we couldn't see eye to eye
So, darling, darling, darling, this is goodbye
Do I still care? Fool that I am
But I still care, fool that I am
